1.content:
“The legend starts as the land was balanced and all the races of middle earth were at peace and harmony, when evil forces arise the armies would combine to smite the darkness but the evil that came destroyed that bond. Three legendary heroes stumbled upon the burial ground of a sealed dark lord and when they got close the monster awaken sapping the power of the heroes, not much is known after that but this has awaken the full power of lord Akron that released a shock wave that those around miles felt which revived the dead becoming his evil servants. Akron was a demonic entity that exists for chaos and domination thus he had a endless army of undead and demonic beings that ravaged the land and destroyed entire armies in a single blow, this was the darkest time of history and the world was enveloped under a dark cloak and endless night until nine heroes came that pierced the corrupted lands and seemingly undefeatable armies and purged both, this tipped the balance of the war towards defeat of Akron by the heart of where it began, the fallen lands. The leader of the group was named Zero, it was said that he was an equalizer for his mask of day and dusk, his armor with a yin-yang symbol, long silver hair and his two blades one with the pitch darkness of the night and another with the illumination and glow of the sun itself, this man led a last assault on the fallen lands on where Akron’s throne will fall with his army. With raised morale and improved arsenal the armies once lost in the dark came with the full power of light and hope cutting through the army that once slaughtered them while Zero with his eight associates faced against Akron with unrelenting force and assaults that eventually defeated and ridded Akron the face of middle earth. With all the dark army vanquished, peace was restored in the land but the damages done has been scarred for centuries to come and thus the legend ends here and hope to all that this evil will never arise again”

This is the year 2104 where magic and technology exists and the world is seperated by factions that are usually at conflict at each other. You are either a part of these factions or one of the dark armies that want to rule the world, each set of charecters have their own story which can ignore each other or eventually meet with each other, each one determines the fate of earth, so are you on the path of good or evil?

By the way the faction trying to combine the other factions is called the Alliance which the following factions are apart of it, Darkwatch, Ancients, Holy Knights, Splinter cells, and B.I.A (Brothers-In-Arms or brotherhood-In-Arms, same thing)

I also forgot to mention (All) the 9 heroes in the storybook, you know if anyone wants to do some sort of descendent or treasure hunting their weapons or some plot thing I don't want to know about.

Zero- Main hero, already explained

Ferro Abyss- Bird anthro, the master assassin of the group who's knowledge of stealth, counter-tactics, and status effects made him deadly on the field
Weapon- Vera laminae percussori (Blades of the true assassin)

Vorgan Lovic- Orc, the heavy beserker that wouldn't let anything stand in his way. When it came to clearing a path through an army, he delivers and destroys everything in the process.
Weapon: Mace of the molten core (Guess what? Earthquakes!)

Luna Ecluse- Night elf, the master mage that has the power of the night and sun, light and darkness, the beginning and end of time. A powerful ally.
Weapon: Baculum tempus (The staff of time)

Hondew Casmodan- Dwarf, the master of drinking till he drops and demolitionist. The father of explosives and expert at blowing things up without any safety, completely crazy at explosions, but very useful.
Weapon: Explosives and the Kanone (Boom!)

Frolier Limick- Halfling, the brilliant inventor in the group. The experianced inventor that created many traps, invented new weapons, and the only one that had a gun
Weapon: praestantissimum magnum

Legolis Amick- Wood elf, the master archer that had deadly accuracy and never missed a target. Very useful in both long range and short range as he is quick with a blade as his sight is sharp.
Weapon: Arcus aquila (Bow of the eagle)

Avila Quin- Human. The immoveable force that is her impenetrable armor and shield, no matter how powerful the attack she never seemed to move in the slightest. She became the guardian in the group who covered the others as she sustained unlimited forces while they attack.
Weapon: impenetrabilis metallum murum and Herbam susceptor (The impenetrable shield and blade of the protector)

Vindicus Ignis- Fire demon, the defector. Vindicus was a general in Akron's army, but then something changed after a certain someone felt their aura and changed their heart. Now he was a fighter in the group as the fire expert, who defeated many, many opponents with masterful fire magic that incinerated everything into black, charred corpses.

But back to the dessert of Ares, it was strange there was a dramatic change of scenery where it was grassland, to a long stretch or rocky terrain, to an endless dessert. We were just on the boundaries and I could see fossilized trees and other vegetation, abandoned buildings that look like sandstone and battle-worn, destroyed artillery, tanks, jeeps, planes, etc. that are rusted and worn-out, and there were several rock formations.

"This place, the land is filled with the blood of war and the anguished souls of thousands, it...it makes me worried what is this place?"Questioned Natalie with a shiver
"The dessert of Ares, surprisingly, used to be the fifth largest rainforest in the world, it had amazing amount of magical capabilities, a vast amount of vegetation, luscious landscapes, large population of fauna, and had about 23 clans who were some of the best scavengers in the world but a war happened two destructive factions, the boomers and firebugs, the boomers had the largest and best explosive and artillery in the world, the firebugs were experts in anything related to fire, from fire magic to incendiary rounds, to flamethrowers, and to firebombs and unfortunately the forest was the final battleground between these two factions and the battle lasted for two months to finish and incenerated the rainforest, fortunately the 23 clans had underground passageways and tunnels with multiple entry ways, but that was over 50 years ago and the clans turned into one known as the dessert rats, the scalvengers who hid underground and came up to use the remenants of the war to survive. I am not exactly sure how they were found out but apparently they can make anything out of the most useless materials and make an effecetive weapon." answered Tech
"That might be the reason why we need them, their amazing skill in jury-rigging"I said, "Now lets traverse this dessert of war!" i yelled and we rode our horses into the dessert. 20 minutes have passed and the only things we saw were the same things, the fragments of the long war and the strange rock formations, its surprising the dessert rats have lived underground in these conditions for so long.........

"Yeah i did....oh I am an idiot for not thinking of that, Viktor use your metal, sonar, movement sight anything i'll use my pip-boys sonar to detect movement underground"He said, first i used my metal detection vision which was a bad idea since all i saw was metal fragments everywhere interfereing with my vision, with my movement-detection sight i can see something underground coming towards us....fast, I look around to see spots where skeletons were are moving,

"In that case just go to the temple and see if its there, if it isn't there then try to find it, just be careful when you encounter it, the needle is a killer"

Viktor was getting peeved that Simon was basically running circles around him and even when he hit him it didn’t seem to do much. Although in their match they didn’t notice what is coming to them in the sky

“Ah shit! Incoming!” I looked up and saw the flying creature dive bombing towards us with Gray Heart still hanging on, before I could react they impacted between me and Simons fight. There was dust everywhere and parts of the creature who is regenerating, on the ground next to me I found one of Gray’s blades, I picked it up and tried to find Simon with the aura sensing vision where if there was a dark aura it was him. It didn’t take long to find him because he was faced down on the ground; I kicked him over and was ready to impale him through the heart when I said
“Any last words?” Simon still had no face and he was bleeding out his aura
“Simon says nothing, but fear” I stabbed him through the heart and there was just a loud and heart-wrenching guttural scream of pain in which the creatures that he summoned turned to stone and then to dust. The area afflicted with his appearance on the scene was returning to normal and the sun was shining through the dark skies. The two that helped me waved good-bye and then disappeared. I looked back to Simon’s body that is no longer bleeding essence but instead, blood. There was a journal in his hand which I didn’t see before and I saw his face, it was very pale, his eyes had no soul and his hair is sapped of its color. Simon stopped breathing and then his body turned to stone.

Thus the mist walker and the nightmare were defeated by both and Trick appeared next to Viktor to talk about the next memory to fight, and that means it is my turn. I closed the book and began to get out of the library to fight Viktor. I know what will happen; I am not getting out in one piece.

“So, I defeated two of them and Xeilia is the last one, any tips on how to handle her?” I asked Trick
“DO NOT DIE, that is my tip”
“Thanks, so when is she coming?” Then where the clock tower was, a pentagram appeared below it which glowed violet and then it just turned the clock tower violet which destroyed it in an instant.
“Now, oh and you are fucked” Trick disappeared and Xeilia appeared where the clock tower was destroyed. Xeilia is a night elf so of course she would have the purple skin, silver-white hair and amber colored eyes. She was wearing a violet robe/cloak that had mystic runes on them plus it covered her head to toe which she also had a mask covering her mouth and the mystic tome book thing in her arms.
“So…the final person I have to beat and it had to be you” I said to her “Goddamn it all, which person would counter her abilities?” I thought to myself
“I know, from fate will yield, you will fall here” Xeilia said, damn her voice is so soft and soothing and I really hope that doesn’t distract me.
“Xeilia, your book may know the fate of others, but I have the soul and spirit to defeat it” I said with confidence
“We shall see” Her voice got more serious and yellow pentagrams appeared sporadically across the area “Fallen stars!” very quick flashes erupted down from the skies and impacted the ground heavily releasing very powerful and bright lights and knocked me back hard into a building across the entire way. I was hurt badly, I gripped myself on the arm because I no longer felt it and there as just blood dripping everywhere and my armor ahs been reduced to shambles.
“Okay, think!” I told myself as I gripped my own head “Which person or people can beat her, which…OF COURSE!” I had an idea and thought about the person perfect to beat her, the person who is damn over-powered and a part of the wanderer’s...Shauk Pricaur. When I remembered him he was standing right over me and he lent a hand,

“Need help there old friend?” he questioned and I got up myself
“Just help me beat her” I look at Shauk, I forgot what race he was and his crystallized white armor covering his entire body only covers it more, he had a crystal prism blade that is long and elegantly shining, and he was damn ready to fight Xeilia and then Trick came up behind me
“Wow, I remember this guy” He said in delight
“By the way, why did you give us the option to take people from our past to help fight with us, not that I am complaining”
“You cannot rely only on yourself, but you cannot rely on others to do it all” He responded
“Okay, thanks wise old man”
“Shut up and watch the fireworks” I saw Shauk meet up Xeilia on the battle grounds
“By the way, mind-“
“Taking us on the roof? Sure” We just magically appeared on the roof to see the damn action, the thing about Shauk that makes him OP is the fact that his armor has an amazing armor rating against magic and physical and if a substantial amount of energy hits his blade he flings it back at the attacker 10 fold. This man (of something) is the ultimate counter-fighter, but he can be beaten. I couldn’t tell what they were talking about, but all I know is that Xeilia summoned something from the skies and was a gigantic angelic blade from heaven
“Now that is overkill” I commented then it impacted directly on Shauk which he was actually was holding the giant blade back with his own and then the blade was absorbed into his prism blade and he unleashed a bright rainbow of energy at Xeilia which not only destroyed her, but it basically took out half the city in a straight line, both of us were speechless and Shauk yelled
“My work is done!” He disappeared and both of us were staring the destruction

“Okay Viktor, this one was kind of overpowered for you so it won’t go against you, now it is time for you to beat me” He said and we instant transmission to an area of the city that wasn’t ravaged, I looked around to find Trick, but he wasn’t anywhere,
“Okay Viktor, this is a test of survival, try to survive my onslaught of attacks for 2 minutes or let’s see if you can find me, ready? Go!” His yell echoed through the empty streets.
“This would be easier if my armor wasn’t-“A shot rang out and hit my in the arm before I even finished “Screwed…well this is bullcrap" Long story short I did survive the onslaught of bullets that keep rebounding towards me no matter where I ran or hid. Apparently Trick was at a vantage point that oversaw everything so he was able to get me.
“Congratulations! You survived the first passage, now there is a couple more to go!” Trick said and I groaned
“Couple more areas to fight or a couple more people?” I questioned and I was damn tired and still in pain, and he still ignored it
“More areas to fight more people, speaking of, all of your friends went through their passage and here are the ones who lost, Alyssa and Sargith. Renma, Dusk, Tech, Natalie and Johnny passed their passage and are moving on to their next area, which would be a team battle with your friend Tech and the others a randomized order.”
“So why me and Tech the ones not randomized?” I asked and I was still in pain from all of the shots I taken
“Both of you basically had the same list of friends so why not? Oh and don’t worry about your friends who lost, they are helping out the guys in the real world and worry not about your armor and condition, it will all be okay…right now” There was a sudden flash of light and I arrived at-

111111211112111112111221212212111.content:
I was warped to a forest area lying down and looking up at the very bright sky.
“This forest...now which one is this?” I thought to myself when a silhouette blocked my view “Tech that better be you”
“Yeah it’s me; now get your mind out of the gutter, you really have to meet our guides for this one” I looked up to see two people sitting on a log (Both human) Doc and Gabriel. Doc, which is his initial for Dimitri Oravice Circen, but we call him doc for laughs and giggles and coincidentally that his specialty. He is white with a green and blue eye, black medium hair; he is about averaged height and is wearing a brown hard lab coat and a red scarf around his neck, what he has for weapons are a bunch of bottles and syringes under his lab coat. Gabriel is a very muscular, tall black person with black short hair, red eyes, and wears a full-stone armor with red runes plus a giant ham-axe (Hammer + Axe hybrid) imbedded with fire runes and rage.
“This is the forest passage of both your memories of where two of you with a bunch of your friends trained here several times and beaten the living crap out of each other” Doc said
“Rules in this area are that you cannot remember any past friends so you have no support at all”
“Okay then, where are we battling for the first match?” Tech questioned
“The training ground” Doc answered and there was another sudden flash. Both of us ended up at the old training ground where there were just dummy posts scattered around the area, targets, craters, charred bodies and trees.

Tech was looking at some of the dummies that were battle damaged “Huh, I wonder if this is a hint on what we are fighting first” Then I heard something whirring and charging
“Wait what the-?” Then I saw something glowing red in the tree line and it was aimed right at the unsuspecting Tech “Tech, watch it, behind us!” I yelled over to him, he looked back and saw the red glare of the weapon and then the bullet rain of the weapon coming right at him, but he thankfully got out of the way and the bullets made mincemeat of the dummies, targets, and the trees. Tech was just yelling at the amount of destruction the weapon caused and imagined what would have happened to him

“Ah, bloody hell, I missed the target. Ah, I have to stop frickin’ spray n’ pray’n” Said a cocky sounding voice and I figured out who it was, Gunny, and low and behold he came out of the tree line. Gunny was below average height, human, had black eyes, brown short hair, wore a full forest-camo suit with armor and had the devil rifle (A fully automatic weapon that is big, red, black, and has a lot of mechanisms specifically for fast-shooting, reducing recoil, and increasing damage to turn regular bullets into heated death bringers)
“Wait aren’t there suppose to be two of you?” I asked and then I heard a whistling sound “That is Lau’ Zen isn’t it?” I said blankly
“Are panda’s black and white?” Gunny questioned, it was true, Lau’ Zen is a panda that was a heavy weapons specialist, but sometimes his aim is very off.
“Tech, do you take the heavy weapons specialist or the commando?” I asked him and Gunny was just grinning sadistically
“…is that a trick question?” Then another artillery shot landed in the tree line “Uh…good luck with the commando!” Tech just ran into the woods while I am facing the commando *Boom* and avoiding the artillery at the same time

“Oh Viktor!” Gunny said in a sing-song voice, I look at him and his weapon started to glow more brilliantly red, I ran into the tree line to avoid some of the shots “Say hello to my little friend, Hellfire!” He just opened fire into the tree line completely annihilating everything in the way, the bullets just melted through everything and I was just running through the tree line firing slugs at him, but from my point it wasn’t going to do much.
“Ahahahahah…wait where the dickens you go?” He questioned, apparently he was enjoying firing so much he lost track of what he was firing “Oh bugger all” I was hiding behind a target and I heard still heard the explosions, but it was far of in the distance, even with the trees I could see electricity flying into the air. It must be one heck of a fight and then I heard something rustling, I readied my weapon and saw it was just a deer.
“Wow, random ass fauna. Wait a minute” I had an idea and I fired a shot near the deer’s leg and it ran throughout the tree line, I just hope he fell for it and from the look on his face he did.
“There you are! Eat hot lead, it is hunting season!” He opened fired again; damn that weapon has a lot of ammo. While he was distracted with the deer, I snuck around and crept silently behind him until he realized it wasn’t a deer.
“Wait a minute, that’s a bloody deer what the-?” I quickly shot him in the back 4 times; he hit the ground and was bleeding out quickly
“Ah, you cheeky little bugger, I should’ve known goddammit! Screw my bad sight!” He was reaching for his weapon and I shot his arm which it was not longer attached to him “Come on you bastard, finish me!” I was aiming at his head when I heard artillery falling down; I look up to see it coming down hard, I dived for cover as Gunny yelled “Oh bloody hell! This is fucking friendly f-“I just heard an impact, explosion, and the sounds of gore and blood splattering all around. I got looked up after the explosion and saw the only thing left there was his weapon and alot of pieces of his body.
“Now that is how you end it, with a bang, now rest in peace Gunny…rest in pieces, dammit I keep forgetting this is not real!” I checked to see the condition of Tech through the radio, “Hey Tech, did you defeat Lau Zen?” There was crackling, but I heard his voice
“If I have burns all over me and that he martyrdom himself, yes I defeated him and thanks for asking for my condition” Tech joked and there was another flash and this time we were at a waterhole (All with the waterfall, river leading off, rocks covering the area, and trees in the background)

“I remember this place; we used to take breaks here, screw around with the local wildlife, and I remember the time one of the guys accidently froze the place and everyone used his face to break the ice” Tech said, feeling nostalgic for the good old days.
“I would hate to see who we are fighting” I retorted until I heard rustling in the woods and a figure flying over head “Screw my sarcasm” Then the figure landed and the one hiding in the wood work came out of hiding.

1111112111121111121112212122121111.content:
The one that was hiding was a female wood elf in an elite forest ranger robe (Basically a female version of links outfit plus a face mask) was Zaire Reis: She was slim, had purple-dark eyes, and had blonde hair. The one that landed was Regis Plasmateur, an insectoid looking person that is tall with all the insect-looking armor, mask and four wings. But in reality he is really a hybrid of an insect and I think human.
“Oh I remember these guys…oh crap I remember these guys, well this is going to be extremely annoying” I said to myself and Zaire just brought out a mystic bow, fired up, and then the single arrow shattered into a wall of mystic arrows and Regis was screeching very loudly that were making our ears pop. Both of us were cupping our ears in pain, “Tech, any ideas?! I yelled over to him and he quickly let go of his ears and pounded the ground with electricity
“Thunder dome!” A dome of electricity surrounded us blocking some of the arrows and most of the hyper-sound
“Tech…have I ever said how useful you are?” I asked him and he was focusing on keeping the dome on “Well I fucking love you bro…no gay crap” Then the dome started fluctuating
“Thunder shock!” The dome instantly dispersed spreading in a wide area “Wait, Viktor what did you say? I was partially deaf from Regis”
“Oh nothing…just yelling out orders” I looked at where the two were attacking us from and saw that both were temporarily stunned “I take the ranger and you zap the bug?” I asked him and he nodded “Alright then!” Tech went over to Regis and began zapping him while I went over to the tree line and searched the area with a thermal vision. That was when I got shot in the back in the arrow

“Seriously, is that all you got” I was taunting her until there was a humming sound “Hm? What is- AUGH!” I was forced down hard into the ground “Screw gravity arrows or whatever the arrow was!” I was slowly getting up when I heard a twang sound and then I felt a very hard force knocking me back into a tree, I immediately held my head up and saw an arrow heading right for me, I immediately got my shotgun and blasted the thing in mid-air, but then it released some sort of poison cloud and it was still heading for me, I rolled out of the way and it hit the tree, melting it away. “Well this is going to suck a lot”

Then I heard an explosion, I looked around to see what that was and it was explosive impact arrows. I was literally just running and dodging the arrows because I did not want to blow up and I had no clue where she was, even with the thermal vision. “Okay then, life detection?” I switched to the life detection and everything just glowed. For fucks sake this is getting annoying! I just stopped caring and loaded random types of shells into the shotgun “You want to play hardball? I'll give you overkill!"

I randomly shot throughout the forest random shells which things were lit on fire, things froze, and others were reduced to nothing. I reloaded and fired then repeated the process when I accidentally fired several splinter shells (Splinter shells were special ammunition that had angled lead parts that bounced off everything until it ran out of velocity or durability. These were banned in several military installations for massive amounts of friendly fire incidents.) And then everything went to hell. The splinters were bouncing off of everything, some hitting me and brutally injuring me, some went through wood and rock like it was butter, and then I heard someone yell in pain.

I was going to check up if Zaire was dead or not until I heard someone yelling in the sky, I looked up and it was just an electrical light show with Tech on Regis’s back and zapping him and Regis is flying erratically shocking Tech with his own electricity. I assumed that he needed help getting him down since it looked like he was doing nothing, so I loaded in a single slug shot and took aim. I aimed carefully and leaded the target, I fired and fortunately I somehow hit Regis and he was going down, unfortunatley Tech was with him so...damn.

At the crash site where Regis landed, Tech was just sitting on a rock and he was nursing a bullet hole in his side.
“Nice shooting, for the love of all that is mighty I didn’t need help, I had it all under control!” Tech said with a bit annoyance and anger in his voice
“Let me guess, Regis had electricity resistance to his armor and he was countering your electricity with his own?” I questioned
“That about covers it, so I suppose your done with your battle?” He asked
“I think so, I accidentally shot several splinter shells and everything went to shit and then I heard a howl of pain”
“I am not going to ask why you had a splinter shell, speaking of which next time you decide to pull off a shell roulette that is unoriginal, make sure you don’t have destructive ammunition in your pocket!”
“So, when are we changing scenes?” Then there was a flash and we were at a steep cliff over looking an ocean “Ok, never mind” The sun was setting and the brilliant reflection off the water gives even more peace. This is the same cliff where some of us would watch nature’s beauty until one of us grows bored of it and launches the explosives. Speaking of which since this was the last match before we fight Doc and Gabriel. I just wondered who we would face, then I noticed the person sitting at the cliff

11111121111211111211122121221211111.content:
There was one person sitting on the edge of the cliff. It was definitely female, she had long purple hair, seemed short, wore a full black outfit and she had 4 blades strapped to her
“Tech refresh my memory, I forgot who that is”
“That is Jai’sai Korosu"
“Huh, I would love to see how good she fights, hold on I am going to come up to her” I went up to Jai who was watching the sunset and was completely ignoring me “Hey Jai, it is time to fight us” She was quiet until she sighed
“You two aren’t worth the time or the effort” She said blankly
“I thought all the memories were supposed to fight us”
“That is correct, but I am different because it is a waste of my time”
“So how are we supposed to pass through you?”
“This is how” One of her blades started glowing black and purple “Demon rise 8th legion” Her blade unsheathed itself and dove itself into the ground making black vortex’s on the ground with black creatures emerging from them “Try to survive”


Long story short a bunch of demon-like enemies came out to fight us whom most were generic soldiers with melee weapons and long-range weapons while there was a few that were more special and annoying to take down…oh and Tech was smothered by a giant black blob.

The demon soldiers that attacked us were all slain with their blood covering the battle area, their bodies ripped to shreds or burned from electrocution, Jai didn’t even care about what happened and Tech was covered in black gunk.
“What the hell is this stuff?” Tech said in disgust while he was wiping the black gunk off his armor
“Well congrats on beating the minor demons, they were useless anyway” All the demons blood and bodies evaporated into black mist “Now lets see how you handle this, Echoed mirror, 1st soul” The second blade glowed teal and blue as two pentagrams appeared on the ground and 2 figures emerged. What I noticed about the two figures is that they were ethereal and they basically had the same weapons and armors as us, just without the face.

She continued to look at the distance and the two doppelgangers attacked us and we attacked back, but there was a problem, we kept canceling each other out making a large stalemate.
“Hey Tech, you mind stunning this guy for me?!” I yelled over seeing that I was fist fighting him to the edge with Tech and his double throwing electric balls at each other, canceling each other out.
“Sure, right after you shoot this guy!” I quickly drawed my shotgun and shot Tech’s double as Tech zapped my double with electricity. Both were temporarily stunned so we took our chance to attack, I kicked my double off the ledge and Tech just zapped his until it died.

“That wasn’t very long, speaking of which try this one on for size, Clan of fire: 2nd chapter” Jai said as her 3rd blade glowed red and yellow. The things that were summoned was a couple flame atronach, several fire golems, several magma lizards and a ton of fire skeletons“Oh you have got to be kidding me! KNOCK THEM OFF THE LEDGE!”

Another long story short, the summoning were a bastard to beat due to how many of them, but we managed to send many of them off the ledge. Although the ones that were to heavy or stubborn to knock off were kind of a bastard to beat due to either their massive defense or that they moved so much that we couldn’t aim for crap.

“Next time, don’t use another summoning to attack us!” I yelled at her “Seriously we just need to beat you and that will be it”
“Don’t worry, you have one more summoning to beat”
“Thank you! Jeez!” Her final blade glowed brilliantly white
“Dragon heart, 5th winter 2nd rise” Then I heard a very loud roar followed by a giant arctic dragon.
“That thing better not eat me” Tech said as he prepared for the worst and I loaded incendiary shells into my shotgun. The dragon then landed behind Jai and roared right in our faces, then the dragon breathed out a frost breathe that was as cold as winter. Speaking of winter I was completely frozen to my neck.

“Holy crap this is cold!” I yelled out and I tried to move anything which it didn’t work and I fell over to the ground still frozen “Uh, sorry Tech, but I am currently unavailable right now. If you want to leave a message, do it after the scream of not feeling your own balls…OH MY FUCKING GOD! AHHHHHHHHHH!”
“Ah, screw me then!” Tech yelled out and then the battle started with him yelling out moves, tons of electricity, and roaring.

For most of the battle I did not see anything since my face was on the ground, but I heard alot of generic battle stuff
“Hey Tech are you done with that dragon yet? I am tired at looking at ground for the next 3 hours!” I then heard a loud gulping sound from the dragon and muffled shouting “Oh that doesn’t sound good” I also heard something rumbling and electricity crackling “Oh wait a minute” I heard a loud dispersion of electricity behind me and I am pretty damn sure some of the dragons parts landed near my head and on my back.
“Thank god I got out of that dragons stomach! Jeez I smell like shit *Groans* Okay Viktor I am going to break you out of your ice prison” I heard Tech come up behind me and he began smashing the ice off.
“Congratulations on beating the dragon, but unfortunately your princess is in another castle” I joked and I got out of my prison “Thanks” I went up behind Jai and was very pissed “Okay Jai, did we win?”
“Yeah…actually you sort of did, but those weren’t me and you haven’t beaten me yet so technically you didn’t beat me, but since I called forfeit because both of you are a waste of my time” She then stood up and jumped off the cliff
“Okay…that was anti-climatic” Tech said and then Doc and Gabriel came up from the tree line
“Indeed, that means you have to fight us next” Gabriel said
“Alright then, are both of you ready to fight?” Doc questioned
“Yes we are!” Both of us yelled

“Right, now give us a second” Gabriel said as both of them back away.
“INTERNAL COMBUSTION!” Gabriel yelled out as he slammed his fist together engulfing himself in fire
Doc pulled out a syringe and inserted it in his arm which he looked very twitchy and shaky “Ready!” Doc said very quickly. When Doc ran he was just a blur and he went between us, took Tech and went back in the tree line

“Oh damn” I said and Gabriel tackled me down to the ground and began to punch me in the face with his fist’s of fury. I tried to kick him off, but it didn’t work as he was just very heavy and continued relentlessly with the barrage of fiery fists of doom. That was when something exploded between us knocking both of us back, Gabriel was sent flying into the trees while I was launched near over to the cliff. I just assumed that there was a grenade on my belt that was ignited by Gabriel’s fire, either that or a shell went off as you know ammunition can be set off by fire. I quickly got up and readied my shotgun by loading cryo rounds to try to counter his raging fire, which I just saw his internal combustion ignite even hotter and he was charging with his hammer over him ready to smash me. I rapidly shot the cryo rounds into him which it did something, but he didn’t seem to care as he continued to charge towards me very quickly. That was when I got a very crazy idea so I went over the Cliffside and held on to the side of it, well I hope it works.

“Viktor, you are not getting out that easily! Gabriel roared as he actually went over the cliff and went into the deep water below which created a lot of steam. I climbed back up and began running into the forest to help Tech.
“Good thing he can't swim” I thought to myself as I got to the edge of the forest and I saw a fireball coming straight for me, I ducked and saw that Tech was running which he bumped into me very hard and we both went down. “Tech where’s the fire?” I asked him
“Coming straight for us!” Tech yelled as we both got up quickly and prepared to fight whatever Doc injected into himself
“What did he inject into himself?” I asked
“A lot of eve-hypo’s!” Tech responded
“Eve-hypos? Wait don’t tell me-“Doc came out of the forest line and I could see what he did to himself. The guy that used to be this scrawny chemical expert was now a hulking brute with veins popping out and tons of different powers and energies flowing through him “Ah…shit”
“Don’t worry this won’t hurt a bit!” His voice has gotten more deformed and distorted “It will hurt like hell!” Doc charged straight for us and both of us were bashed into the forest. I hit a tree with so much force that I was sure that my spine snapped, for Tech I have no clue where he went. Doc was stomping towards me and I got my shotgun and unloaded on him, it seemed to do something, but he didn’t seem to care as his arms were engulfed inflames and was about to smash me down when I loaded in a splinter round in my shotgun
“Don't worry, I'm an expert!” I fired the splinter round…

After the splinter storm that almost killed me I looked up to see that Doc got completely screwed over by the looks of how shredded open his entire body was, it was basically just a hulking ravaged corpse that was eaten by a pack of buzzards and wolves. Yet there hasn’t been an indication that we were done.
“Hey Tech! Form up on my position ASAP!” I yelled out and he immediately came out with several wounds on him
“Dammit Viktor, friendly fire” Tech yelled out in a pissed off tone
“Ah shut up, either your dead or your alive with gunshot wounds” I said and he stared at me blankly. Then there was another flash, this time it was in a city covered by snow and ice...

111111211112111112111221212212111111.content:
“Well isn’t this a winter wonderland” I said while we were standing in the middle of an arctic wasteland which is very dim with a lot of clouds, but no snow dropping. I looked over to Tech who is checking his pip-boy to see where this is
“Unknown location, well isn’t that dandy”
“C’mon, let’s see if we can find something” I said and we wandered the city wasteland.

After searching for anything of use we found a newspaper and Tech picked it up
“Quit picking things up, how is this supposed to help us?” I questioned
“Hold on I found something” I looked at the newspaper and saw a message

You know that there are those memories that you wish that were gone, those times where you forgot, or those memories where there was a very, very annoying person to beat, well this is it in a nutshell and more. There is a chance that you may encounter people the other person hasn't met yet. Also there is a high chance of death since all of them are one of the harder opponents.

“Great, so we are now fighting people who are now even stronger" Tech said
"Well, this is one way to practice fighting" I said as both of us walked in a random direction.

--
I watched from the rooftops, hiding from sight as both went in the direction of the clock tower; let’s see how they fare against them
--

We walked right into the city square to see what you would normally see in a square, frozen trees, frozen operating clock tower, and all the generic central furniture that is frozen.
“Now why the hell would there be these things be here?” I questioned
“Special plants that can live in the freezing cold, I think this is just for aesthetics” Tech responded as the clock tower began to ring its bell which sounded very horrendous
“That clock tower might as well be the final boss!” I said when I noticed something strange about the clock; the number 12 was glowing red “Tech do clock towers do that?”
“I’m guessing that's the number of guys we have to fight, well isn’t this going to be absolute bull?” Then suddenly the entire area was graying out and it seems time has stopped, then there was a static noise and crackling

“Tick-tock, your time is almost up, maybe its time you meet some old friends” A disembodied voice said as 12 figures that are clouded by darkness appeared around the clock tower
“Well here we go again, this time there are 12 of them” I said as 2 shadows dispersed leaving 2 people that had the same weapons and armors as me and Tech, except they were red “You know sometimes I hate doppelgangers, but I think this is a bit to much”
“Who are you calling doppelgangers?” The red Viktor questioned
“We are better versions of you, stronger, faster, and smarter!” The red Tech said
“I think the term evil versions fit the description just right” Tech responded
“Let’s just fight!” I yelled and took a shot at my double that took the shot, but didn’t seem to care
“Was that supposed to hurt?” He questioned “Our turn” My double pointed his shotgun at me and it glowed a blood-red color as Techs double charged an attack and red electricity sparked all over the ground as I loaded in random shotgun shells and Tech charged his attack, then we let everything light up.

“Red Dawn!” My double shot a series of red lasers at us
“This is overkill, I swear" I quickly unloaded different shotgun shells into their path
“Zeus Maelstrom!” Techs double literally made a red electrical tornado
